title: Who owns Casey\'s Barbecue and where is that person from originally.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20051117/NEWS/51116010 NOTE: I'm going to ask one of my freelancers to do a story about the owners for an upcoming Living Local section. Look for the story in a few weeks in the Wednesday StarNews and at StarNewsOnline.com.
